bill.title: Children; clarify reporting of certain crimes against.
bill.description: An Act To Amend Section 37-11-29, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Clarify Reporting Of Child Abuse, Child Sexual Abuse, Child Neglect And Sex Crimes Against A Minor By Mandatory Reporters; To Specify That Except As Provided By Sections 43-21-353 And 97-5-51, School Employees Shall Report Unlawful Activity On Educational Property Or During A School Related Activity To The Superintendent Or His Designee Who Shall Notify Law Enforcement; To Clarify That A Public Or Private School Employee As A Mandatory Reporter Under Section 43-21-353, Shall Report Child Abuse, Child Sexual Abuse And Child Neglect As Specified Under The Youth Court Act; To Clarify That A Staff Member Of A Public Or Private School Shall Report Sex Crimes Against A Minor As Defined By And In Accordance With Section 97-5-51; To Provide That A Mandatory Reporter Shall Not Delegate To Any Person The Responsibility To Report, But Shall Make The Report Personally In All Cases Of Child Abuse, Child Sexual Abuse, Child Neglect Or A Sex Crime Against A Minor As Well As Report To The School; And For Related Purposes.
